snippet.title: Tower of Fantasy - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
Open world RPG Tower of Fantasy will launch to PlayStation this summer!

Open World:

The core of Tower of Fantasy is exploration and adventure. For this reason, we created a huge open world for players!
You will become a Wanderer and start your adventure journey in a post- apocalyptic wasteland world named Aesperia. Of course, this is just the beginning. 
There is Vera ahead, where is completely different from Aesperia. This is a dream land composed of the boundless desert and a cyberpunk city.
Vera also has a three-dimensional underwater world called Grand Sea. Different from the terrestrial ecosystem, you can dive into the bottom of the sea and swim with fish schools. Being in the ocean, fighting and exploring are another experiences.
The newly opened area Domain 9 of the game is a brand-new oriental magical world with obvious stylized art style, which is quite different from Aesperia and Vera. 

Multiplayer: 
The adventure in the open world is not alone. Tower of Fantasy provides multiplayer game options. You can team up with friends, take pictures and interact with each other in the world; you can also join a Crew and complete more difficult tasks with other members. You can also explore the world on your own. The way you play is entirely up to you!

Ready to start your adventure?
Pre-Orders for Tower of Fantasy are coming soon!
Pre-Orders can provide Wanderer supply packs and rare items to support your adventure!
We also prepared exclusive items for PlayStation users!
If you purchase Premium pre-order versions, you can get a 48-hour early access to enter the game!


#PlayStationShowcase #ps5 #ps5games #TowerofFantasyPS #ToFPS #TowerofFantasyPS5 #TowerofFantasyPS4
